DOC.brief_summary: This study tests the assumption that the bioavailability of alprazolam from a new sublingual formulation is the same as that from an existing commercial immediate release tablet formulation.
DOC.brief_title: Bioequivalence of a New Sublingual and a Reference Alprazolam Immediate Release Tablet Formulation
DOC.criteria: Healthy male or female subjects BMI 17.5 30.5 Must provide informed consent Clinically significant disease Narrow angle glaucoma Positive drug screen
